name: Hosiana Home For Ancient Sorcerers
description:
"in the first 200 years of a sorcerer's life, one should aim to become master of a magical school and to master a tower. in the next 200 years, the aim should be to become the sorcerer supreme of a kingdom and to fully master transmutations. finally if one is gifted enough to reach the ripe age of 1000 years old, the true wise sorcerers will eventually realize the insignificance of their existence and just sit back to watch the cosmos unfolds"
-Elder Maleeh, current oldest member of Hosiana Home for Ancient Sorcerers
